definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)
pinyin: Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4

sentences.english: Reshetnikov was a celebrated Soviet pilot who fought on the Eastern Front in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 列舍特尼科夫是2战中东线战线的著名苏联飞行员。

sentences.english: Fourth, Northeast anti-Japanese national united front is characterized by its universality.
sentences.chinese: 第四，东北抗日民族统一战线具有广泛性。

sentences.english: How should we evaluate China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 对全国教育战线十七年的工作怎样估计？

sentences.english: This is a great success in the front of politics and ideology of our party and our country.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们党和国家在思想政治战线上的一个伟大胜利。

sentences.english: The battle lines of the new world order were exposed at the World Trade Organization this week.
sentences.chinese: 本周，新世界秩序的各条战线在世界贸易组织曝光了。

sentences.english: China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 对全国教育战线十七年的工作怎样估计？

sentences.english: All our ideological work has to be improved.
sentences.chinese: 整个思想战线的工作都需要加强。

sentences.english: In all our work we must persevere in the Anti-Japanese National United Front as the general policy.
sentences.chinese: 在一切工作中，应该坚持抗日民族统一战线的总方针。

sentences.english: The landings called for an assault on a five-divisional front.
sentences.chinese: 登陆要求在五条分割的战线上进行突击。

sentences.english: No enemy was contacted by our patrols on all our fronts today.
sentences.chinese: 今天在各条战线上敌人均未与我方遭遇。

sentences.english: Recently, I was called to the Religious Affairs Bureau and the United Front Work Department.
sentences.chinese: 最近我被国家宗教事务局和统一战线工作部传唤。

sentences.english: All Party comrades must strive to consolidate and develop this united front.
sentences.chinese: 全党同志必须为这个统一战线的巩固和发展而奋斗。

sentences.english: Our patrol on all our fronts contacted no enemy today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我方在各条战线上的巡逻队均未遭遇敌人。

sentences.english: On the economic front, China is paying the price for its rescue plan.
sentences.chinese: 在经济战线，中国正在为此前的营救计划付出代价。

sentences.english: Now is the time to intensify the struggle on all fronts.
sentences.chinese: 现在是我们在各条战线上加强斗争的时候了。

sentences.english: It is the vital second front in the battle against creative mediocrity.
sentences.chinese: 因为这是在反对创意匮乏的战役中重要的第二战线。

definition: a front (militant group)/line of battle/alignment (towards a political party etc)
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
